item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Bottom line is, even if you see 'em coming, you're not ready for the big moments. No one asks for their life to change, not really. But it does. So what are we, helpless? Puppets? No. The big moments are gonna come. You can't help that. It's what you do afterwards that counts. That's when you find out who you are." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Jane Espenson, Maurissa Tancharoen & Jed Whedon
item.description: "DeWitt: Loneliness leads to nothing good, only detachment. And sometimes the people who most need to reach out are the people least capable of it." -- Jane Espenson, Maurissa Tancharoen & Jed Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl-- you find someone to carry you." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Make it dark, make it grim, make it tough, but then, for the love of God, tell a joke." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Every day's a negotiation and sometimes it's done with guns." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Loneliness is about the scariest thing out there." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "If you can't do something smart, do something right." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Brian K. Vaughan
item.description: "They hurt you. You hurt 'em back. Or maybe it is the other way around. Whatever. Someday you might find a way to forgive each other. But it won't be like it used to 'cause that pain never really goes away." -- Brian K. Vaughan

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon
item.description: "Snyder:There are some things I can just smell. It's like a sixth sense." Giles: Well, actually, that would be one of the five." -- Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "You take people, you put them on a journey, you give them peril, you find out who they really are." -- Joss Whedon
